item.title: Setting up a Domain
item.description: A Step-by-step Guide to Custom Domains with Github To add a custom domain to your newly created website, the process is fairly simply. For this process, I’ll be referring to the same project discussed in my previous post that is this website which is hosted via Github Pages. Step 1 - Purchase Domain The first step of this process is going to be to purchase your preferred domain via a domain provider.

item.title: About this Website!
item.description: How I built this website, and how you can too! Hey, thanks for checking out this post. This will be a quick read on how I host and maintain this website! Keep in mind, this post is written with the assumption that you are familiar with programming languages, version control, and some HTML/Markdown experience. To get started, you'll need a github account, and the following software installed: git GO programming language Hugo Depending on what operating system you are using, you may need to install the software differently.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my personal website! This is my personal website! Feel free to browse to view my education, background, and professional experience. You can also see some of my personal projects and certifications I have taken, or plan on taking in the near future. My next post will explain how I built this website, and what skills were required to do so. Subsequent posts will explain projects I am actively engaged in, so stick around to find out more!
